product_name: Lange RSJ 65 Jr Ski Boots - Juniors' - 2013/2014
long_description: A great boot for your up-and-coming speed demon, the Lange RSJ 65 Jr ski boots delivers precise performance and an exact, comfortable, junior fit. With a 60 flex index, Lange RSJ 65 Jr ski boots provide a soft flex appropriate for young skiers who have progressed past the basics. Based on adult liners used in racing boots, the RSJ 65 Jr liners feature shaped padding and neoprene toe boxes that provide warmth and comfort. Low cuffs are designed to maximize the natural range of motion for young skiers. Arched soles enhance flex and provide a distinct feel that helps young skiers dig into their turns. Shells are designed to create a centered, balanced stance using a low heel lift and an upright forward lean. Upright stance makes it easy to stay balanced on today's shaped and rockered skis, reducing fatigue and increasing efficiency of skiing technique. The Lange RSJ 65 Jr ski boots are desgined for racers and all-mountain skiers ages 12 and under.
short_description: A great boot for your up-and-coming speed demon, the Lange RSJ 65 Jr ski boots delivers precise performance and an exact, comfortable, junior fit.
